title: Format query output using groupBy()
description: Combine groupBy() with format() or assignment operators to create human‑friendly summary fields and labels, rather than showing raw field names.

examples.name: Example
examples.description: Creates a summary text field that reads naturally and can be displayed directly in table or text widgets.
examples.query:
#event_simpleName=ProcessRollup2
| groupBy(ComputerName, function=count(as="ProcessEvents"))
| summary := format("%s executed %d process events", field=[ComputerName, ProcessEvents])
